column2: Apax seeks $3 bln sale of healthcare IT firm TriZetto -sources NEW YORK
column3: Aug 19 Private equity firm Apax Partners LLP is exploring a sale of U.S. healthcare information technology company TriZetto Corp

DLTR,Dollar General enters race for Family Dollar with $8.95 billion bid Dollar General Corp offered to buy Family Dollar Stores Inc for $8.95 billion, trumping a bid by Dollar Tree Inc and aiming to strengthen its dominance of a growing segment of retailers serving penny-pinching customers. |Video  
DUK,BRIEF-Coast Guard says 8,000 gallon diesel spilled to Ohio river from Duke Energy stationDuke Energy reports oil spill into Ohio riverUPDATE 3-Oil spill from power plant closes 15-mile stretch of Ohio River Aug 19 The U.S. Coast Guard closed a 15-mile stretch of the Ohio River on Tuesday after at least five thousand gallons of fuel oil spilled from a 60-year-old power plant owned by Duke Energy 20 miles east of Cincinnati, Ohio.  UPDATE 3-Oil spill from power plant closes 15-mile stretch of Ohio River Aug 19 The U.S. Coast Guard closed a 15-mile stretch of the Ohio River on Tuesday after at least five thousand gallons of fuel oil spilled from a 60-year-old power plant owned by Duke Energy 20 miles east of Cincinnati, Ohio. Aug 19 U.S. power company Duke Energy  said on Tuesday about 5,000 gallons of fuel was spilled into the Ohio River during a routine transfer of fuel oil at its station near Cincinnati.UPDATE 3-Oil spill from power plant closes 15-mile stretch of Ohio River Aug 19 The U.S. Coast Guard closed a 15-mile stretch of the Ohio River on Tuesday after at least five thousand gallons of fuel oil spilled from a 60-year-old power plant owned by Duke Energy 20 miles east of Cincinnati, Ohio.
